author: John Bowden
title: More coronavirus patients testing positive again after recovery: report
description: Some coronavirus patients in South Korea and China have tested positive for the virus a second time, health officials are warning....
content:
Some coronavirus patients in South Korea and China have tested positive for the virus a second time, health officials are warning.
Bloomberg reported Thursday that Korea's Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) said in a statement announcing a form… [+1529 chars]
